name: Pillars of Eternity 2: Deadfire - Beast of Winter
summary: Far in the southernmost reaches of the Deadfire Archipelago, frost and death have encroached upon the land of the living. You, Watcher, have received a missive from the isle's residents: worshipers of Rymrgand, the god of entropy and disaster.

videos.title: Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire - Beast of Winter - Launch Trailer
